snippet.title: Right and Down - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2008050/Right_and_Down

A roguelike, dungeon crawler, card game that is played using only two buttons: Right and Down! Choose your hero and explore randomly generated card dungeons, gather powerful artifacts to get new abilities, and fight against increasingly powerful enemies! Will you make it to level 100?
